## WorkspaceAudio class

Class for loading, storing, and playing audio for a workspace.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class WorkspaceAudio 
```

|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [getMuted()](./blockly.workspaceaudio.getmuted.md) |  |  |
|  [load(filenames, name)](./blockly.workspaceaudio.load.md) |  | Load an audio file. Cache it, ready for instantaneous playing. |
|  [play(name, opt\_volume)](./blockly.workspaceaudio.play.md) |  | Play a named sound at specified volume. If volume is not specified, use full volume (1). |
